description: Details of foul and surface drainage pursuant to condition 32 of planning permission PP/2014/4426 dated 04/03/2015 for Partial refurbishment, demolition and redevelopment of shopping centre to provide 4 storey residential accommodation fronting the burial ground and eastern perimeter of the site, together with 4 storey building on High Street with residential accommodation above a reconfigured High Street mall entrance and shops. Refurbishment of existing mall units, refurbishment and extension of two units to provide one 1,217 sqm class A1 retail unit and creation of a new 533sqm unit (A1/A2/A3/D2) above Belvedere Public House. Provision of 36 residential units, storage, plant, circulation space and amenity space; provision of 76 car parking spaces including 4 disabled spaces and 38 cycle parking spaces, with access from Churchfield Road. Provision of landscaped pedestrian link between the burial ground and High Street.
